ygData.subject: Re: Are Bards useful? A diatribe...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, Be really careful with charm in dungeons - esp Guk (upper and lower)... I used to really _hate_ pets in dungeons - esp in pick-up groups. ... Use your
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm,

Be really careful with charm in dungeons - esp Guk (upper and lower)...

I used to really _hate_ pets in dungeons - esp in pick-up groups.

> From: John_Senior@...

> I also noticed that I was fighting stuff that conned yellow to me at 37 so
> I couldn't even use charm when we got a big pull. I think Verant should

Use your mez (Pixie Strike) that way you can crowd control 2 mobs and not be
too bothered with a hard cap (level difference will show more resists though
but keep clicking.)

Sylly SongSynger
Bardette of 45 songs
<The Pantheon>
somewhere on Innoruuk...
